name: Diane TURNER v. Edward YONKIN, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: Diane TURNER v. Edward YONKIN, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
PAPADAKOS, J., dissents.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Deborah L. Barr, Towanda, for E. Yonkin, Jr.
Sam Lewis, Montrose, for D. Turner.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 292
Diane TURNER v. Edward YONKIN, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dee. 6, 1994.
Decided Dec. 30, 1994.
Deborah L. Barr, Towanda, for E. Yonkin, Jr.
Sam Lewis, Montrose, for D. Turner.
Before FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
